items.en: I know how to markup HTML/HTML5 tags correctly and semanticly. And I also have patient to play with WCAG standards.
items.ch: 能充分理解HTML/HTML5，并正确的使用他们。如果你对WCAG标准也有兴趣，我也能耐心的实现。

items.en: I using Grunt/Gulp to manage/optimize front-end working process.
items.ch: 会使用Grunt/Gulp 来管理/优化前端开发流程。

items.en: Not only coding OOP style for PHP/JavaScript, but also organize the Less/Scss efficiently.
items.ch: 对像化思维方式编写代码PHP/JS，并藉此将sass/less编译出高效的css.

items.en: Familiar the technology that jump outside of <abbr title='中国的#网%络@封*锁，使得很多最新的前端技术不为国人所知' class='initialism'>GFW</abbr>. Cloud service like Firebase/Codio, MVC framework like Angularjs/Laravel, RESTful API like google/facebook/Wechat,etc.
items.ch: 熟悉国外的一些先进技术: Firebase/Codio之类的云端服务, Angularjs/Laravel之类的MVC框架, google/facebook/Wechat之类的RESTful api.

items.en: I like develop responsive website. Developed a lot of projects that using SVG/CANVAS .
items.ch: 喜欢开发响应式网站。用过svg/canvas开发过一些项目。

items.en: Not just limted in Front-end, I also coding at Back-end side, favorite PHP, curious Python.
items.ch: 不仅仅前端，我也会写后端代码, 比较喜欢PHP, 对Python也有兴趣。

items.en: I take care of cross browser issues, so survived from those 'IE6 age'.
items.ch: 我很注重兼容性, 甚至IE6也难不倒我。

items.en: I know the importance of team working, so write comment, and fix bugs responsibly.
items.ch: 我明白团队的重要性，所以写注释, 修bug都比较严谨。

items.en: Even can design, both for web and print.
items.ch: 甚至会设计，不管是平面的还是数码领域。
